# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and superior quality, it's not just a purchase but an investment in enhancing your experience. Considering its value and benefits, I would like to extend this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $85. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
